SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT r.REPORTID) AS total_count FROM REPORT r LEFT JOIN TReview tr ON r.REPORTEDTREVID = tr.TREVID LEFT JOIN TReviewComment tc ON r.REPORTEDTREVCID = tc.TREVCID LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON r.REPORTERID = m.MEMID WHERE 1=1
AND r.REPORTSTATUS IN ('RECEIVED', 'INPROGRESS')
AND r.REPORTSTATUS IN ('COMPLETED', 'REJECTED')
AND tr.TREVTITLE LIKE '%' || #{dto.search} || '%'
AND m.MEMNICK LIKE '%' || #{dto.search} || '%'
AND tc.TREVCTEXT LIKE '%' || #{dto.search} || '%'
AND (tr.TREVTITLE LIKE '%' || #{dto.search} || '%' OR m.MEMNICK LIKE '%' || #{dto.search} || '%' OR tc.TREVCTEXT LIKE '%' || #{dto.search} || '%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.REPORTID, r.REPORTERID, r.REPORTEDTREVID, r.REPORTEDTREVCID, r.REPORTEDCONTENTTYPE, r.REPORTREASON, r.REPORTDATE, r.PROCESSDATE, r.REPORTSTATUS, tr.TREVTITLE AS postTitle, tc.TREVCTEXT AS commentContent, m.MEMNICK AS reporterNickName,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY
r.REPORTDATE DESC r.REPORTDATE ASC r.TREVCREGDATE DESC
) AS rn FROM REPORT r
LEFT JOIN TReview tr ON r.REPORTEDTREVID = tr.TREVID LEFT JOIN TReviewComment tc ON r.REPORTEDTREVCID = tc.TREVCID LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON r.REPORTERID = m.MEMID
WHERE 1=1
AND r.REPORTSTATUS IN ('RECEIVED', 'INPROGRESS')
AND r.REPORTSTATUS IN ('COMPLETED', 'REJECTED')
AND tr.TREVTITLE LIKE '%' || #{dto.search} || '%'
AND m.MEMNICK LIKE '%' || #{dto.search} || '%'
AND tc.TREVCTEXT LIKE '%' || #{dto.search} || '%'
AND (tr.TREVTITLE LIKE '%' || #{dto.search} || '%' OR m.MEMNICK LIKE '%' || #{dto.search} || '%' OR tc.TREVCTEXT LIKE '%' || #{dto.search} || '%')
) c WHERE rn BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{pageRowCount}
